channel.title: Is it still playable?
channel.description: Just curious guys, is RuneScape really still playable/enjoyable if your more of a close-minded pre-eoc lover?

item.title: Is it still playable?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I would play 2007, but I didn’t play RuneScape for years to just start over. Others may not mind but I do. I’m not doing that. If they started us off where we were at that time I would have played, but I am not starting from nothing all over again.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it still playable?
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

mihalich:

Tbh its not the same at all and some love it others hate it. All you can do is give it a shot and see for yourself no one can answer the question for you.

Remember to try 07rs also!

Read full topic

item.title: Is it still playable?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I personally hated when they removed the unlimited trade, took out the wildly, and brought in bounty hunters. It was so stupid and didn’t fix anything. That’s when I quit. Now I love rs because the game isn’t so much of a grind anymore (I have 0 time to grind all day) and is relaxing.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it still playable?
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

just tried it, couldnt do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it still playable?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I’ll be honest. I tried to get back into the game. I went in open minded but the game has changed too much for my taste. I personally don’t like anything past 2010-2011. My favorite time was in 2009. That’s when Bounty Hunter worlds(Not the cave) was awesome. I pked a lot and was in vent/skype with people all day long. I tried to go back, even to skill. The community itself isn’t the same. “Post EOC” isn’t a proper term. Times have changed.

As of the game, I liked EOC but what I don’t like is their CEO, he has done some weird things to the game and it can’t be fixed.
That is my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it still playable?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Here is basically what I’ve come to understand

  1. EoC pushed RS in a new direction, far away from what its original playerbase wanted. This does not make it a bad game, just alienated players who enjoyed the old system

  2. Jagex has created Bonds, which are basically legal forms of purchasing RSGP. If you are against Microtransactions and things of that nature, then beware.

  3. As far as I know the community still sucks, and there is a lack of playerbase due to the bot take over.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it still playable?
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

mihalich:

If you’re looking to do some bossing yes f2p will suck pretty back but for skills I guess it’d be fine. Get some gp from skilling and buy a bond for 6m in the ge and swap it for 15 days membership when you can.

ok that sounds really interesting im getting on lol

Read full topic

item.title: Is it still playable?
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Well I expected a response like that, because my question wasn’t specific enough. I’m not necessarily close-minded to any new revisions, but I don’t particularly like the new look. All I’m curious about really is if skilling/minigaming/pvming is still basically the same? I used to be a big pvp lover, but not so much now.

Read full topic
